shape_3_per_frame1=i=instance;          ni=num_inst;
shape_3_per_frame2=
shape_3_per_frame3=///// water ripples (2D)
shape_3_per_frame4=
shape_3_per_frame5=x=-.5+(i%ni)/ni;
shape_3_per_frame6=y=-.5+(i%sqrt(ni))/sqrt(ni);
shape_3_per_frame7=
shape_3_per_frame8=d=sqrt(x*x+y*y);
shape_3_per_frame9=y=.6*y+.03*sin(15*d-2.5*time);
shape_3_per_frame10=
shape_3_per_frame11=zoom=1.5;
shape_3_per_frame12=x = .5 + zoom*x/q6;
shape_3_per_frame13=y = .5 - zoom*y;
shape_3_per_frame14=
shape_3_per_frame15=rad=rad*zoom;
per_frame_1=decay=.8;
per_frame_2=zoom=1.0;
per_frame_3=wave_a=0;
per_frame_4=warp=0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=q6=aspecty;
